subject: URGENT: Your account will be suspended
body: Your account has been compromised and will be suspended immediately unless you verify your identity. Click here to verify: http://phishing-example.com/verify
label: phishing

subject: Congratulations! You won $1,000,000
body: You are the lucky winner of our international lottery! To claim your prize, please send your personal information immediately.
label: phishing

subject: Security Alert: Unusual Activity
body: We detected unusual activity on your account. Please verify immediately by clicking: http://fake-bank.org/verify
label: phishing

subject: Update your payment information
body: Your payment method has expired. Please update immediately: http://scam-site.com/payment
label: phishing

subject: Inheritance Fund Transfer
body: I am Prince from Nigeria with inheritance fund. Need your help to transfer $5 million. Send bank details.
label: phishing

subject: Weekly team meeting reminder
body: Hi Team, reminder that our weekly meeting is tomorrow at 2 PM in conference room. Thanks, Sarah
label: legit

subject: Order confirmation #12345
body: Thank you for your purchase. Order #12345 confirmed and will ship in 2-3 business days.
label: legit

subject: Monthly newsletter
body: Welcome to our monthly tech newsletter covering AI, cloud computing, and cybersecurity trends.
label: legit

subject: Project deadline reminder
body: Friendly reminder that project deadline is next Friday. Please submit all deliverables on time.
label: legit

subject: Welcome to our service
body: Welcome! We're excited to have you. Please complete your profile and explore our features.
label: legit
